h1_title: How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss
h2_title: How to Summon the Shigandang Boss
content: However, after losing around a fourth or more of its health, the Shigandang will most likely grab the Stone Vanguard and perform a devastating pile-driver slam, before flinging the Stone Vanguard aside as it breaks apart.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Defeat_the_Stone_Vanguard_With_Another_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss', specifically from the subsection 'How to Summon the Shigandang Boss'.
The content is as follows:
However, after losing around a fourth or more of its health, the Shigandang will most likely grab the Stone Vanguard and perform a devastating pile-driver slam, before flinging the Stone Vanguard aside as it breaks apart.
